title: Excellent Learning Outcomes
description:
The electives are Marketing Management, Human Resource Management, Financial Management, International Business Management, Information Technology Management, Operations Management, Banking & Financial Services, Business Analytics, Risk Management, and Supply Chain Management.

All courses cover key concepts, practices, and trends in that domain.

title: Offered in Four Specializations
description: It is offered in specialization where the students get the opportunity to choose from five electives namely marketing, human resource, finance, entrepreneurship & family business and banking & insurance in fifth & sixth semester.

title: Industrial Internships
description: Your Internship will help you build a network of industry insiders, gain valuable work experience, explore career options, gain a competitive edge in the job market, and learn specific teaching-learning methods before applying them.

title: Industry-Relevant Topics
description: This programme rigorously covers industry-relevant topics to help students find a job and succeed as entrepreneurs or employees. This programme is based on best practices and industry-relevant skills.

title: Learn from Industry Insiders
description: Industry and International business school experts work with regulators, certification providers, and technology partners to create programmes. Industry experts teach this advanced programme.
